reviews.review: Great Game!!!......Though community can be improved

This game is literally satans nut sack and is absolutely garbage because,

a.) has fueled my gambling addiction ever since I was 12 years old.

b.) Demonstrated a community that is more bipolar than Kurt Cobain after drugs.

and c.) Showed how absolutely dumb and retarded people in the their mid 30s are after drinking 20 Natty Lights and refuse to brush their teeth or go outside.

However on the bright side, it teaches you dedication and how to deal with teammates that genuinely need anger management. If you don't have hair on your nuts to play this game and your voice sounds specifically like Simon from Alvin and the Chipmunks, then hit that puberty button and buckle your nuts for one roller coaster of a game.
监管里全是转的不见你封，你整监管有什么意义？
非常公平的竞技游戏，而且还配合开箱，哈哈哈，主要是竞技模式非常好玩

Counter Strike vem dos primórdios onde marcou uma geração que o pessoal jogava nas lan houses em uma época que não era comum banda larga em todas as casas junto com um computador para rodar o Game.
CSGO marca a nova geração trazendo a engine mais famosa do jogo de tiro polícia vs terrorista (ladrão).
Jogo muito bom, excelentes gráficos, otimizado e sempre com atualizações.
Só peca um pouco na questão dos hacks quando não se joga com pessoas conta PRIME. (lv 21 ou R$89,90).
This is a good game without hackers
Dieses Spiel ist sehr gut und macht Spaß ^^

Hallo Community,
egal wie oft man durch die Lobbys Nervenzusammenbrüche oder epileptische Anfälle bekommt, oder wie sehr man sich über seine osteuropäischen Mitspieler in den zahlreichen Internetcafés dieser Welt und ihren Bambusheadsets aufregt, CS:GO zieht einen irgendwie nach spätestens einer Stunde immer wieder in seinen Bann und darum ist es eine klare Empfehlung für jeden der gerne Shooter spielt, zumal es jetzt sogar kostenfrei ist. Also Taschentücher für die tränenden Augen bereitlegen und auf geht's ...
Mit schizophrenen Grüßen DonJulio
honestly great first person shooter and a fun game to play all around
